name: Joana's Projects: Lost in Harmonia
description:
Imagine a world without colors,
Imagine a world without melody,
Joana is there,
and she has to restore it.

Joana, a game music composer try to make a music for her client. However, she have no idea to made it. Until she collapsed and brought to a place named Harmonia. This place is suffered because it lost it's sound and color. Joana is dragged to save them.

Play challenging platformer stages in nice 2D pixel art and a gradually completion musics and color on each stages.

The control is using keyboard, you can move Joana by using left and right arrow keys, and you can jump by using space key. You can double jump, and you can also step on the enemies to destroy them.

This game is provided in Bahasa Indonesia.
